content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **materials ** * japanese size 4/0 crochet hook 2 5 mm * recommended yarn is pierrot uv cut baby which is specially dyed to cut uv rays reaching the skin * color a 40g 136 m * color b 45g 153 m * 5 buttons 15mm size 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/28-bk4/
